description: Configuration for the effects/sounds linked to in-game special abilities.

propertyNames.description: Ability names must be a sequence of basic alphanumeric characters without a space.

activatedSound.description: The gestalt id of the sound effect played upon ability activation.

effect.description: The particle effect used upon ability activation.

effectFile.description: The gestalt id of the .emitter file for this particle effect.

tex.description: The gestalt id of the particle texture for this effect.

tint.description: Colors can be defined as a keyword, or in the form `rrr ggg bbb`, `rrr ggg bbb aaa`, `hsb hhh sss bbb` or `hsb hhh sss bbb aaa`

floatsUp.description: True if particles will float opposing the gravity of the nearest planet, default false.

size.description: The default unit size of each individual particle. Almost always overwritten for special effects.
